name: Tank PVP thing
description:
A small single-screen pvp action game. In other words tank go pew-pew

controls:

plr1

w/s -foward/backwards

a/d - rotate the chassis

q/e - rotate the turret

2 - shoot

plr2

left stick vertical (i/k) - foward/backwards

left stick horizontal (j/l) - rotate the chassis

right stick horizontal (u/o) - rotate the turret

right shoulder btn (8) - shoot
